page.title: 10Employment_Leck area
page.content: Even as little as fifty years ago people lived where they worked because of transport difficulties.Lots more people worked on the land. Often girls worked in in the farm house,vicarage or large country house.As well as working on the farms there was employment at the village cobblers, black smith and two village shops.People now live here but work in towns like Lancaster and Kendal.They work a lot further away now because transport is a lot better.A lot more people in this area are professional people now. They can afford to live in the country and drive to work in the towns. The few people who still work locally often find it hard to afford houses here when they get married.They work in farming, haulage, warehousing, building, and joinery trades.
